Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute near Sheridan/Albion
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses rerouted WB via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Clark & Devon; EB via Devon, Clark, Pratt, Ashland & Morse due to street blockage near Sheridan/Albion.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Sheridan/Albion.

  • Westbound buses will operate via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Clark & Devon.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via Devon, Clark, Pratt, Ashland & Morse.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Sheridan/Albion
ShortDescription: Northbound 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, Clark, Pratt and Sheridan due to street blockage near Sheridan/Albion.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, Clark, Pratt and Sheridan due to street blockage near Sheridan/Albion.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th  buses are rerouted via 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route on 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route on 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Wentworth.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
